onboarding.welcomeDescription: Discover special offers just for you and start benefiting from campaigns immediately!
onboarding.discoverDescription: We need your location to show you the nearest campaigns and offers.
onboarding.qrCodeDescription: Show the QR code to the businesses, and benefit from discounts quickly and easily!
onboarding.mapsDescription: Discover nearby businesses, view discounts, and easily get route information. Start saving with buum-e Maps!
onboarding.notificationsDescription: Allow notifications to stay informed about the hottest offers near you.
onboarding.readyDescription: Sign up now and start discovering discounts!
onboarding.locationPermissionDenied: Location permission denied. You can only enable it in settings.
onboarding.notificationsPermissionDenied: Notifications permission denied. You can only enable it in settings.

authentication.logoutModalDescription: Are you sure you want to logout?
authentication.guestModalDescription: You need to register to use all features of buum-e.

errors.User.NotFound: The account you are trying to login to was not found.
errors.Authentication.NotFound: The account you are trying to login to was not found.
errors.Authentication.WrongToken: The one-time code you entered is incorrect.
errors.Authentication.UserAlreadyExist: This phone number is already registered.
errors.Authentication.UnknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

authorization.dontHaveAccess: You don't have enough permission to do this operation.

login.title: Login
login.headerDescription: Please enter your phone number to login.
login.otpSheetDescription: Please enter the 6-digit verification code we sent to <bold>{{number}}</bold>.
login.loginSuccess: Please enter the code sent to your phone.

register.title: Register
register.headerDescription: Sign up now and start discovering discounts!
register.linkText: Already have an account? Login here!
register.firstStepCheckbox: I have read and agree to the KVKK text.
register.firstStepDescription: Sign up now and start discovering discounts!
register.firstStepSuccess: Please enter the code sent to your phone.
register.otpSuccess: Welcome aboard! Complete your profile and customize your experience!

account.title: My Account
account.logoutModalDescription: Are you sure you want to logout?
account.profileModalMessage: You have requested to switch to the business account. If you have a registered business, please login or register for a new business account immediately!
account.updateMyProfileDescription: You can update your profile information here!
account.specialOffersText: Don't miss out on exclusive deals!

errors.User.NotInValidAge: You must be at least 18 years old to register.
errors.File.NotValid: The profile photo you are trying to upload is invalid.
errors.File.UploadError: An error occurred while uploading the photo.

business.title: Businesses
business.openMapMessage: Which map do you want to use?
business.campaignSheetLinkText: Can't read the QR code? Try the code below
business.noBusinessesFound: No businesses found. We will reach you as soon as possible!

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.noNotificationsFound: You have not received any notifications yet. We will notify you when they are published!

likes.title: Likes
likes.noLikedBusinesses: We are sorry you don't have any liked businesses yet. Start exploring and find the perfect one for you!

businessOnboarding.step1Description: Let's start with the basic information about your business! Completing this form will help you stand out more on buum-e Maps.
businessOnboarding.step2Description: Now fill in the address information so that users can reach you!
businessOnboarding.step3Description: Now we need a few tax information from you to prove that you are a real business. Complete the form!
businessOnboarding.step4Description: Congratulations, you are almost done! You can add the logo of your business and up to three images. This step is completely optional, but it will make you stand out more on the map.
businessOnboarding.httpsRequiredMessage: Please enter a link that starts with https://
businessOnboarding.businessDescription: Enter a description for the business.
businessOnboarding.businessModalMessage: Your business has been created successfully. What about defining your first campaign?
businessOnboarding.locationPermissionMissing: Location permission denied. You can only enable it in settings.
businessOnboarding.locationRequired: You have not filled in the latitude and longitude information. You can fill them in by clicking the 'Auto Fill Location' button.
businessOnboarding.businessCreatedSuccessfullyDescription: Your business has been created successfully. We will approve your business within one day and you will be visible on our maps.

errors.User.NotFound: The user to be assigned to the business was not found.
errors.Business.NoLogoUploaded: You need to upload the logo of your business.

businessHome.qrCodeModalDescription: You can read the QR code using the camera. If you are unable to read it for any reason, you can also enter the code manually!

businessAccount.workforceDescription: You can manage your workforce from here.

delete.title: Attention!
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the worker?
delete.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting the worker. Please try again later.

campaigns.subscribedBusinessesDescription: The businesses you have subscribed to are here! Click on the businesses to see the campaigns you have subscribed to.
campaigns.subscribedBusinessesEmpty: You have not subscribed to any campaigns yet. You can subscribe now!
campaigns.campaignsByBusinessProgressDescription: The campaigns you have subscribed to are here! Click on the campaigns to see the details.
campaigns.redeemedTitle: Campaign successfully redeemed! üéâ Check your progress on My Account!
campaigns.noProgressFound: You have not redeemed any campaigns yet. Subscribe to a campaign and start redeeming!
campaigns.noCampaignsFound: You have not created any campaigns yet. You can create one now!

redeem.error: An error occurred while redeeming the campaign. Please try again later.

create.mainInfoTitle: You can enter the basic information about the campaign here!
create.timeInfoTitle: You can enter the calendar information about the campaign here!
create.campaignMetadata: What percentage of discount do you want to define?
create.campaignMetadataFixed: How much discount do you want to define?
create.campaignMetadataTakeXGetYProduct: What product do you want to give as a gift?
create.campaignMetadataTakeXGetYPrize: What product do you want to give as a prize?
create.campaignMetadataTakeXGetYQuantity: How much do customers need to buy to get the prize?
create.campaignMetadataTakeXGetYFreeQuantity: How much prize do customers get?
create.campaignDescription: Enter a description for the campaign.

campaignForm.formDescription: You can enter the basic information about the campaign here!
campaignForm.campaignPercentage: What percentage of discount do you want to define?
campaignForm.campaignDescription: Enter a description for the campaign.

errors.CAMERA_PERMISSION_DENIED: Camera permission denied. You need to enable camera permission in your phone settings.

forms.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
forms.invalidDate: You have entered an invalid date.
forms.invalidTimeFormat: Invalid time format. Use HH:MM:SS format.
forms.datesMustBeSame: End date and start date must be the same.
forms.startTimeMustBeBeforeEndTime: Start time must be before end time.
forms.endTimeMustBeAfterStartTime: End time must be after start time.

general.listEmpty: You've reached the end of the list!
general.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission denied. You need to enable camera permission in your phone settings.
